actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Lances. If mounted mount can then make one melee weapon attack.

actions.name: Lance
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 10 (1d12+4) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit 5 ft. or range 30/120' one target 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

reactions.name: Mounted Parry
reactions.desc: Adds 3 to its AC or its mount's AC vs. one melee attack that would hit it or its mount. To do so warchief must see attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Insect Affinity
special_abilities.desc: Insects understand warchief and view it favorably. Warchief can communicate simple ideas through words and gestures with insectoid Beasts and warchief has advantage on Wis (Animal Handling) made when interacting with such Beasts.

special_abilities.name: Jungle Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in jungle terrain.

special_abilities.name: Locked Saddle
special_abilities.desc: Can't be knocked prone dismounted or moved vs. its will while mounted.

special_abilities.name: Mounted Warrior
special_abilities.desc: While mounted mount can't be charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Slippery
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: saves/ability checks to escape a grapple.

special_abilities.name: Spirited Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20'+ straight toward a creature while mounted and then hits with Lance attack on the same turn the warchief can use a bonus action to command its mount to make one melee weapon attack vs. that creature as a reaction.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: Its long jump is up to 20' and its high jump is up to 10 ft. with or with o a running start.
